trans-unit.source: Appointment cannot be make at that time. Please choose another time slot. If you have any questions please contact our Quality Care team at support@healthtap.com. (Error code: %{error})
trans-unit.target: 该时间段无法完成预约。请选择其他时间段。如果您有任何问题，请联系我们的质量保证团队support@healthtap.com。 (错误代码：%{error})

trans-unit.source: Appointment cannot be make at that time. Please choose another time slot
trans-unit.target: 该时间段无法完成预约。请选择其他时间段

trans-unit.source: Yes - it’s true! Health questions submitted to HealthTap are submitted to our network of thousands of doctor across the U.S. These doctors try to answer every question that’s submitted. Questions are most likely to be answered when they have not already been asked and answered, and they are good health questions (easy to understand and useful to the entire HealthTap community). Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 对，是真的！提交到HealthTap的健康问题会被提交到我们网络上的数千名美国医生。这些医生试图回答提交的每个问题。 那些没有被问过或回答过的，良好的， (容易被理解并且对整个HealthTap社区有用的)健康问题最有可能得到回答。了解详情 »

trans-unit.source: There is a small fee (less than the cost of a typical co-pay for someone with comprehensive health insurance) to ask a private question directly to the doctor of your choice on HealthTap. When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question. You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: (对于有全面健康保险的人来说，有一个低于典型共同支付的小额的费用，) 从而可以直接向HealthTap上您选择的医生询问私人问题。当您向HealthTap上的医生提交一个私人问题时，该医生有长达72小时回答这个问题。如果在该时间内未能回答您的问题，您将收到全额退款。了解详情 »

trans-unit.source: To log in to HealthTap you must first register and create an account. When you do this, you’ll pick an email address and password to use. You can change your log in information in your settings at any time. If you’ve already registered and are having trouble logging in, please contact us.
trans-unit.target: 要登录HealthTap，您必须先注册并创建一个帐户。执行此操作时，您将选择要使用的电子邮件地址和密码。您可以随时在设置中更改登录信息。如果您已经注册并且无法登录，请与我们联系。

trans-unit.source: To add other group affiliations to your HealthTap profile, edit your Virtual Practice page. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 要将其他组织成员添加到您的HealthTap档案，请编辑您的虚拟实践页面。了解更多 »

trans-unit.source: Providing helpful answers: answer more
trans-unit.target: 提供有用的答案：回答更多

trans-unit.source: Growing your network of patient and peers
trans-unit.target: 增长您的病人网络和同行网络

trans-unit.source: Accepting new private messages from patients
trans-unit.target: 接受患者的私信

trans-unit.source: The benefits of HealthTap for doctors are spelled out on our doctors page. If you are a U.S.-licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android. Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute. During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed physician in good standing. If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap面向医生服务的好处在我们的医生页面上有详细说明。如果您是美国认证的医生，您可以在线注册或下载HealthTap医生应用程序（iPhone，iPad和Android）。注册过程很快很简单 - 开始只需不到一分钟。在注册过程中，我们将要求提供信息，以验证HealthTap上的每位医疗专家都是具有良好信誉的美国执业医师。如果您在申请过程中需要帮助，请在联系我们的用户支持团队。

trans-unit.source: If you are a U.S. licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android. Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute. During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed doctor in good standing. If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here
trans-unit.target: 如果您是美国持牌医生，您可以在线注册或下载HealthTap医生应用程序（iPhone，iPad和Android）。注册过程很快很简单 - 开始只需不到一分钟。在注册过程中，我们将要求提供信息，以验证HealthTap上的每位医疗专家都是具有良好信誉的美国执业医师。如果您在申请过程中需要帮助，请在联系我们的用户支持团队。

trans-unit.source: Once you have declared your “Known For” topics you have the ability to showcase your expertise in this area and earn the #1 spot on your block, in your neighborhood, city, state, and beyond! You can be the best in your known for areas simply by doing what you do best — helping people who are looking for your expertise. Learn more »
trans-unit.target: 一旦您有了您“闻名的”主题，您将可以在这里展示您在这方面的专业知识，并获得在你的街区，在你家附近，城市，国家甚至更远地方的#关注度！您可以通过做您最擅长的东西 - 帮助需要您专业知识的人，从而成为你所在的领域最好的一员。了解详情 »

trans-unit.source: Adding a video to a Wellness page is a great way to inspire others to improve their health and well-being. Learn more here about our Wellness pages and how to submit your videos directly on HealthTap or via email.
trans-unit.target: 将视频添加到“健康”页面是激励他人改善健康的好方法。在这里了解我们的健康网页，以及如何直接在HealthTap或通过电子邮件提交您的视频/target>

trans-unit.source: Get your free personalized app today! Download our mobile app. Or we'll make you your own
trans-unit.target: 今天就获取您的免费个性化应用程序！下载我们的移动应用。或者做出你自己的应用
